entry.title: Anime storyboard template for Apple Pages

link.title: Anime storyboard template for Apple Pages

entry.content:
This is an anime Storyboards template for DIN A4 vertical (portrait) page ready to use. You can edit this .template file in Apple Pages. Designed for anime Storyboards, with 5 frames per sheet, each frame sets an exact 1.85:1 aspect ratio space for pictures. The layout draws inspiration from the excellent Studio Ghibli Storyboards.

Boxes:

  • The first column indicates cuts. Use it to number your shots—you can have several pictures for the same shot.
  • The second and main column stands for the picture screen. That’s where you draw or place your pictures.
  • Then there is a space for your script notes for action, dialogue, etc.
  • The last column, time, is for annotating the duration of your shots in seconds.

To get started, just change the text and drop your pictures into the placeholder frames. To add a page, click on the (+ sign) Add Page above the left navigation panel. To change a given page’s master, use the right navigation panel (under Format).

To change pagination, go to Format, then Page Numbering. To remove it, toggle off the Footer’s visibility. Change the template to make it your own. Fill in the header, add your credit and project details, add your production title or your logo. Your layout will be ready to export for print or screen in no time.

FYI: The document size is a 21 x 30cm vertical sheet, about the size of a DIN A4 sheet. The body text font is Avenir Light, 9 points with single line spacing. You’ll find different typographic styles in the Format panel.

Note that you need the Avenir typeface license to use this template.

If you need Storyboards arrows & icons, you can get some for free here: https://gum.co/Storyboards-arrows.

This template is ideal to design quick anime Storyboards layouts and will help you create beautiful presentations!

You can get the Japanese version of this template, for Apple Pages at https://gum.co/Ghibli_Pages_Jp.

You can get the free version of this template, in PDF format at https://gum.co/ghibli-Storyboards-english and the editable Adobe InDesign version at https://gum.co/Ghibli_En_idml_185.

Get this anime Storyboards template!
entry.summary: This is an anime Storyboards template for DIN A4 vertical (portrait) page ready to use. You can edit this .template file in Apple Pages. Designed for anime Storyboards, with 5 frames per sheet, each frame sets an exact 1.85:1 aspect ratio space for pictures. The layout draws inspiration from the excellent Studio Ghibli Storyboards.

entry.title: 1.85:1 Anime storyboard template for Apple Pages

link.title: 1.85:1 Anime storyboard template for Apple Pages

entry.content:
This is an anime Storyboards template for DIN A4 vertical (portrait) page ready to use. You can edit the .template file in Apple Pages. Designed for widescreen Storyboards, with 5 frames per sheet, each frame sets an exact 1.85:1 aspect ratio (Widescreen) space for pictures. The layout draws inspiration from the excellent Studio Ghibli Storyboards.

Boxes:

The first column, カット indicates cuts. Use it to number your shots.

The second and main column is 画面 which stands for the picture screen. That’s where you draw or place your Storyboards shots.

内容 stands for content, use this space for your notes (dialogue, action, etc.)

The last column, 秒 is for annotating the duration of your shots in seconds.

To get started, just change the text and drop your pictures into the placeholder frames. To add a page, click on the (+ sign) Add Page above the left navigation panel. To change a given page’s master, use the right navigation panel (under Format).

To change pagination, go to Format, then Page Numbering. To remove it, toggle off the Footer’s visibility. Change the template to make it your own. Fill in the header, add your credit and project details, add your production title or your logo. Your layout will be ready to export for print or screen in no time.

FYI: The document size is a 21 x 30cm vertical sheet, about the size of a DIN A4 sheet. The body text font is Avenir Light,10 points with single line spacing. You’ll find different typographic styles in the Format panel.

Note that you need the Avenir typeface license to use this template.

If you need Storyboards arrows & icons, you can get some for free here: https://gum.co/Storyboards-arrows.

This template is ideal to design quick anime Storyboards layouts and will help you create beautiful presentations!

You can get the free version of this template, in PDF format at https://gum.co/ghibli-Storyboards-english and the editable Adobe InDesign version at https://gum.co/Ghibli_En_idml_185.

Get this anime template for Pages!
entry.summary: This is an anime Storyboards template for DIN A4 vertical (portrait) page ready to use. You can edit the .template file in Apple Pages. Designed for widescreen Storyboards, with 5 frames per sheet, each frame sets an exact 1.85:1 aspect ratio (Widescreen) space for pictures. The layout draws inspiration from the excellent Studio Ghibli Storyboards.

entry.title: Free invoices tracker for mac numbers

link.title: Free invoices tracker for mac numbers

entry.content:
templates-vault:

If you are a fellow freelancer, feel free to get this free spreadsheet template for Apple Numbers to help keeping track of your assignment invoices and clients payments. The template is set in €, which you can easily change in Numbers. It has a 21% VAT column which you can customize to your country’s percentage, remove or set to 0% if VAT doesn’t apply. The net earning column helps you give you an idea of your actual earnings—check with your accountant which percentage best applies to you. Add or remove rows as you see fit. The template covers a full year.

Get this free Invoices tracker spreadsheet!

entry.title: Client list template
entry.content:
templates-vault:

A free spreadsheet template to help freelancers keeping track of prospective clients.

This is a template for Apple Numbers (.nmbtemplate file), so Mac users only.

Get this free client list template!
